Home / Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy

Analytics

We use PostHog for analytics. This includes page views, anonymous session replay, and survey/form responses. PostHog is self-hostable and privacy-focused.

Session Replay

We record anonymous browsing sessions to understand how people use the site. Session replays are tied to form submissions to improve the contact experience. No personally identifying information is captured in replays beyond what you submit in forms.

Form Data

When you submit a contact form, we collect the information you provide (name, email, project details). This data is used solely to respond to your inquiry.

No Third-Party Advertising

We do not run third-party ads. We do not sell your data. We do not share your information with advertisers.

Contact

Questions about privacy? Email hello@corewood.io.

Last updated: February 2026
